traits.name: Age of Fire
traits.description: 'Gains {Aging}. For every {0} {Age}: Applies {Burn} stacks to all enemies equal to half of the amount of {Age} stacks on this monster.'

traits.name: Beacon
traits.description: 'Whenever one or more {Regeneration} stacks are consumed by an ally: Consumes a {Burn} stack on a random enemy to apply another {Regeneration} stack to the ally.'

traits.name: Burning Desire
traits.description: 'For every {0} {Burn} applied to enemies: {Shields} all allies for {1}.'

traits.name: Burning Fire
traits.description: 'For every {0} {Fire} [Aether] consumed by allies: Applies {Burn} to all enemies.'

traits.name: Burning Mark
traits.description: Allies gain +{0%} {Crit Chance} against enemies for every stack of {Burn} on them.

traits.name: Controlled Burn
traits.description: 'For every Aether {purged} or {stolen} by allies: Applies {1} {Burn} to the enemy with the lowest amount of {Burn}.'

traits.name: Cosmic Fire
traits.description: Every [3rd] {Fire} [Aether] generated by your allies is converted into {Wild} [Aether]. {Wild} [Aether] also counts as {Fire} [Aether] for the effects of your skills.

traits.name: Electrical Burn
traits.description: 'Whenever an enemy reaches [5] {Burn} stacks: Deals a {Fire}/{Wind} [Hit] with {3} damage to that enemy and applies {Dodge} to self.'

traits.name: Enkindled Aether
traits.description: '{On Attack}: Consumes up to one {Fire} [Aether] to deal a {0;3} {Fire} damage [Hit] and apply {1;1} {Burn} to {target enemy}.'

traits.name: Kindle
traits.description: 'For every {0} {Burn} applied to enemies: Generates {Fire} [Aether].'

traits.name: Overheat
traits.description: 'At the end of your turn: Triggers {Burn} on each enemy with {C0} or more {Burn} and applies {1;1} {Burn} to this monster for each one.'

traits.name: Overwhelming Heat
traits.description: '{On Attack}: Applies {1} Burn to target enemy for every {Power} stack on this monster.'

traits.name: Rapid Fire
traits.description: 'Whenever an enemy gets {attacked} for the second time in the same turn: Triggers {Burn} on them.'

traits.name: Rising Fire
traits.description: 'Whenever {Burn} triggers on an enemy: Applies {Burn} to the enemy with the lowest amount of {Burn}.'

traits.name: Aethereal Regeneration
traits.description: 'For every {0} consumed {Regeneration} stacks: Generates {1} {Random Aether}.'

traits.name: First Aid
traits.description: 'Whenever {Regeneration} is applied to an ally: Heals them for {1}.'

traits.name: Instant Regeneration
traits.description: '{On Action from any ally}: Triggers {Regeneration} on them.'

traits.name: Leeching Bond
traits.description: 'Whenever one or more {Regeneration} stacks are consumed on this monster: Deals a {3} {Water} damage hit to all enemies with {Weakness}.'

traits.name: Long-Lived
traits.description: 'Whenever {Regeneration} stacks are applied to an ally: Applies an additional stack. The healing of {Regeneration} stacks is reduced by {0}.'

traits.name: Regenerated Prime
traits.description: 'When {Regeneration} triggers on an ally with full health: Applies {Power} to them.'

traits.name: Regenerating Water
traits.description: '{On Water Action from any ally}: Applies {Regeneration} to the ally with the lowest amount of {Regeneration}.'

traits.name: Regeneration Shield
traits.description: 'Whenever {Regeneration} triggers on an ally: {Shields} them for {1}.'

traits.name: Rejuvenation
traits.description: 'Whenever {Regeneration} is consumed by an ally: Cleanses {0} debuff stacks from them and applies them to random enemies.'

traits.name: Toxic Cycle
traits.description: 'For every {0} {Poison} stacks applied to enemies: Applies {Regeneration} to each ally.'

traits.name: Vigorous Edge
traits.description: Your allies gain +{0%} {Crit Chance} for every {Regeneration} stack on them. Each {Attack} consumes [1] {Regeneration}.

traits.name: Ascension
traits.description: 'For every {0} healing of your allies: Applies {1} {Power} to each ally.'

traits.name: Auto Heal
traits.description: '{On Attack}: Heals the ally with the lowest health by {2} x {1}.'

traits.name: Blood Pact
traits.description: 'At the end of your turn: Deals a {Water} [Hit] to all enemies; damage equals [1] for every {0} healing received by allies this round.'

traits.name: Cleanse Corruption
traits.description: 'Whenever an ally is healed to full health: Cleanses {1} {Corruption} from them.'

traits.name: Conversion Pact
traits.description: 'At the end of your turn: Deals a {Fire}/{Water} hit to all enemies; damage equals debuffs cleansed or consumed from allies this round.'

traits.name: Cosmic Healing
traits.description: 'For every {0} healing of your allies: Generates {1} {Wild} Aether.'

traits.name: Healing Hex
traits.description: 'Whenever an enemy’s {Weakness} is consumed: Heals the ally with the lowest health for {1}.'

traits.name: Power Healing
traits.description: 'Whenever {Power} is applied to this monster: Heals each ally for {1}.'

traits.name: Quicken
traits.description: 'For every {0} healing this monster receives or applies to other monsters: Applies {Sidekick} to self.'

traits.name: Recovery
traits.description: 'At the start of your turn: This monster heals itself equal to [1]/{0} of the damage it took last round.'

traits.name: Synchronous Healing
traits.description: 'Whenever you reach {5} [Aether] of the same element: Heals all allies for {2} x {1}.'

types.name: TypeHeal
types.description: This Type focuses on healing allies and providing strong utility effects through healing.

types.name: TypeTank
types.description: This Type focuses on protecting other allies and retaliating against enemies.

types.name: TypeBurn
types.description: This Type focuses on Burn stacks, which deal increasing damage to enemies whenever they try to use Aether.

types.name: TypeWeakness
types.description: This Type focuses on Weakness stacks, which can come in clutch to prevent damage from big enemy attacks.

types.name: TypeAffliction
types.description: This Type focuses on applying debuffs to your own monsters, providing benefits for doing so.

types.name: TypeRegeneration
types.description: This Type focuses on Regeneration stacks, which provide constant sustain throughout combat.
